data.message: I comment as fast as rap god when Eminem posts

replies.message: Really cause it says you're about an hour late for me
Maybe he's talking about typing speed, in which case Rap God speed is definitely not the fastest out there!
Both I meant .. It was minutes late only man :3 ..

Oh. Alright
For me it said different

Eminem's Azguard Rap God - Eminem's World Order

These stars are more capable of taking care of the people and making dissions for the world then our government in charge! The people are already calling them Kings and Queens and love them more then our congressmen! I just do not want them becoming Tyrants its why i attacked there character! I need them to understand that a King and Queen only have 1 Castle and the majority of there wealth is to be used to take care of there people and to construct communities and citys....These stars manage money better then the Government does...they can collect the taxes...Eminem happens to be the smartest one in there bunch! So I would make him KING AS WE MOVE TOWARDS NEW WORLD ORDER! AZGUARD CITYS OF GOLD! HAVE FAITH IN EMINEM AND IN THE STARS THEY CAN DO THIS!
